Package com.github.robtimus.servlet.http

Provides classes and interfaces for working with HTTP servlets.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BodyCapturingFilter
    A filter that captures request and response bodies.
    CookieUtils
    A utility class for cookies.
    HttpServletUtils
    A utility class for HTTP servlets.
    InputTransformingHttpServletRequestWrapper
    A sub class of HttpServletRequestWrapper that applies a transformation on its input stream and/or reader.
    OutputTransformingHttpServletResponseWrapper
    A sub class of HttpServletResponseWrapper that applies a transformation on its output stream and/or writer.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BodyCapturingFilter.CaptureMode
    The possible modes for capturing request and response bodies.

Package com.github.robtimus.servlet.http Description

Provides classes and interfaces for working with HTTP servlets.
